title: Apply a Travel Voucher to a New Booking
description: A customer is booking a new flight and wants to pay for it using a travel voucher from a previous cancellation.

tasks.description: During the booking process, ask the customer for their travel voucher code.
Validate the voucher code and retrieve its remaining balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the voucher is valid and has a sufficient balance to cover the new flight.

tasks.description: Apply the voucher as payment for the new booking and issue the ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the booking using the voucher.
